thread.title: AP Interview: EU Climate Boss Says Emissions Cuts Not Enough
thread.title_full: AP Interview: EU Climate Boss Says Emissions Cuts Not Enough - ABC News

author: abcNEWS
title: AP Interview: EU Climate Boss Says Emissions Cuts Not Enough
text:
Europe's climate chief has acknowledged for the first time that climate pledges made by national governments ahead of a major U.N. conference fall short of meeting the goal of keeping global warming below 2 degrees Celsius (3.6 degrees Fahrenheit).
In an interview Monday with The Associated Press, Climate Commissioner Miguel Arias Canete said the EU's projections show the current pledges to cut or curb greenhouse gas emissions would put the world on a path toward 3 degrees C (5.4 F) of warming.
He says the fact that almost 150 countries have made pledges ahead of a December climate conference in Paris is "an extraordinary result. But we are not there."
He said some G20 countries could raise their ambitions â€” and didn't rule out improving the EU's own emissions target.
  AP Interview: EU Climate Boss Says Emissions Cuts Not Enough
